locations: San Pedro, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Undercover detective Nick de Salvo, and his debonair and corruptible police captain Sebastian Montenero team up to investigate the beautiful, mysterious and overly ambitious Luli-May Tang a Chinese woman running an illegal currency forgery operation in Macao looking for new ventures in The port of San Pedro, paired with Mike Moretti a mute sociopath she employs as her bodyguard. Standing in the way of De Salvo's investigation is Augustine Quintero aka "Quint", a morally ambiguous man looking for new opportunities along with his attraction for the deadly femme fatale.
imdb.title: The Port of San Pedro
akas: The Port of San Pedro (United States)
plot: Undercover detective Nick de Salvo, and his debonair and corruptible police captain Sebastian Montenero team up to investigate the beautiful, mysterious and overly ambitious Luli-May Tang a Chinese woman running an illegal currency forgery operation in Macao looking for new ventures in The port of San Pedro, paired with Mike Moretti a mute sociopath she employs as her bodyguard. Standing in the way of De Salvo's investigation is Augustine Quintero aka "Quint", a morally ambiguous man looking for new opportunities along with his attraction for the deadly femme fatale.::Cleo Valente
